books.author: Dr. Seuss
books.description: A whimsical story that encourages children to explore the joys of reading.
books.title: Green Eggs and Ham

books.author: Margaret Wise Brown
books.description: A comforting bedtime story that gently lulls children to sleep.
books.title: Goodnight Moon

books.author: Eric Carle
books.description: The story of a hungry caterpillar eating his way through a wide variety of food before pupating and emerging as a butterfly.
books.title: The Very Hungry Caterpillar

books.author: E.B. White
books.description: Charlotte's Web is a story of friendship, courage, and self-sacrifice.
books.title: Charlotte's Web

books.author: Roald Dahl
books.description: The story of a young girl with telekinetic abilities who, with the help of her kind teacher, overcomes obstacles at home and school.
books.title: Matilda

books.author: Astrid Lindgren
books.description: The adventures of a spunky young girl named Pippi Longstocking who lives alone with her horse and monkey.
books.title: Pippi Longstocking

books.author: Chris Van Allsburg
books.description: A magical train ride on Christmas Eve takes a boy to the North Pole to receive a special gift from Santa.
books.title: The Polar Express

books.author: Jeff Kinney
books.description: The diary of Greg Heffley, a wise-cracking middle school student navigating the challenges of school, family, and friends.
books.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid

books.author: Rachel Ignotofsky
books.description: Illustrated biographies of fifty pioneering female scientists, engineers, mathematicians, and more.
books.title: Women in Science: 50 Fearless Pioneers Who Changed the World

books.author: Jeanne Walker Harvey
books.description: The true story of Maya Lin, the visionary artist who designed the Vietnam Veterans Memorial.
books.title: Maya Lin: Artist-Architect of Light and Lines

books.author: Kobi Yamada
books.description: A story about the endless potential in all of us and the power of a positive outlook.
books.title: What Do You Do With an Idea?

books.author: Malala Yousafzai
books.description: The story of Nobel Peace Prize winner Malala Yousafzai's fight for education for girls.
books.title: Malala's Magic Pencil

books.author: Peter H. Reynolds
books.description: Encourages children to embrace their individuality and express themselves creatively.
books.title: The Dot

books.author: Dav Pilkey
books.description: The first book in a comedic graphic novel series about two kids who create a superhero.
books.title: Captain Underpants

books.author: Mo Willems
books.description: The adventures of a pigeon who will do anything to drive a bus, despite the bus driver's instructions not to let him.
books.title: Don't Let the Pigeon Drive the Bus!

books.author: Anna Dewdney
books.description: The story of a young llama who must go to sleep without his mother's presence, promoting a peaceful bedtime routine.
books.title: Llama Llama Red Pajama

books.author: Brad Meltzer
books.description: This book introduces kids to Rosa Parks, the "Mother of the Freedom Movement," and her inspirational story.
books.title: I am Rosa Parks

books.author: Oliver Jeffers
books.description: A father's notes for his newborn son, introducing him to the wonders of the world.
books.title: Here We Are: Notes for Living on Planet Earth

books.author: Andrea Beaty
books.description: A story of a girl who loves engineering and inventing, encouraging children to pursue their dreams and embrace their talents.
books.title: Rosie Revere, Engineer

books.author: Vashti Harrison
books.description: Features biographies of 40 black women in American history, inspiring children with their achievements.
books.title: Little Leaders: Bold Women in Black History
